element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm applies a look-up table having two different entries. Two categorical raster layers are used and the value asigned to a cell in the output layer depends on the value of those two layers in the given cell. A resulting value must be defined for each possible combination of input values (i.e. for each pair of key values)

element.name: LUT
element.text: This table defines the resulting value for each combination of input values. If no resulting value is introduced for a given combination, the no-data value will be used in case that combination appears while processing the input layers.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting grid with values obtained from the combination of input values.
